channel.title: How can i add skill level and exp to quest tab?... [317 Delta]
channel.description:
Ok, so im adding construction to my 317 and i need to know how i can get it to say:
Construction Level: (skill level here) Construction Exp: (skill exp here)
its skill #21
Thanks

item.title: How can i add skill level and exp to quest tab?... [317 Delta]
item.dc:creator: @xldarkwinglx xldarkwinglx
item.description:
@xldarkwinglx wrote:

Depends where you want it. I wouldnt know how to add it to the skill tab but I think i would know how to add it the the quest tab. All you would need to do is open up textHandler.java as vain said but i dont think that its that code. I think you would put this:

Construction Level: ("+playerLevel[21]+"")

Im going to try this out now, so I’ll come back with an answer
